results.content: Very good course for learning the Oxygen fundamentals with practice examples. Thank you!
results.content_html: Very good course for learning the Oxygen fundamentals with practice examples. Thank you!

results.content: Excellent course which saved me a lot of time and gave complete understanding how Oxygen Builder works and showed the flexibility and power of the builder.
results.content_html: Excellent course which saved me a lot of time and gave complete understanding how Oxygen Builder works and showed the flexibility and power of the builder.

results.content: As a total beginner of Oxygen, this course was excellent, I learnt so much. I highly recommend this course if you want to learn Oxygen. I only gave 4.5 stars because Oxygen has been updated since this course was released, therefor, some aspects of this course have been updated, and a small amount of configuration was needed during the course. However, don't let that put you off, this course is fantastic for the price. (I wrote this feedback April 2021)
results.content_html: As a total beginner of Oxygen, this course was excellent, I learnt so much. I highly recommend this course if you want to learn Oxygen. I only gave 4.5 stars because Oxygen has been updated since this course was released, therefor, some aspects of this course have been updated, and a small amount of configuration was needed during the course. However, don't let that put you off, this course is fantastic for the price. (I wrote this feedback April 2021)

results.content: Excellent course! Covers so much and in easy to understand lessons. Excellent intro to Oxygen Builder, especially for a "newbie" like me. I refer back to this course for all my design projects, all the time now.
results.content_html: Excellent course! Covers so much and in easy to understand lessons. Excellent intro to Oxygen Builder, especially for a "newbie" like me. I refer back to this course for all my design projects, all the time now.

results.content: Excellent course for learning how to use Oxygen builder, which is attractive because of its extensive support for flexbox and css grid, classes, and reusable templates, and for its independence from themes. The instructor’s pacing made it easy to follow along and complete all the lessons. The progression of lessons made learning and retaining procedures easy, and the plugins for adding dummy posts and images saved time. Overall a great course and reference. A couple of things that might be  better are the sound quality (less echo or whatever creates “roundness”) and the video quality on a few screens that contain code.
results.content_html: Excellent course for learning how to use Oxygen builder, which is attractive because of its extensive support for flexbox and css grid, classes, and reusable templates, and for its independence from themes. The instructor’s pacing made it easy to follow along and complete all the lessons. The progression of lessons made learning and retaining procedures easy, and the plugins for adding dummy posts and images saved time. Overall a great course and reference. A couple of things that might be better are the sound quality (less echo or whatever creates “roundness”) and the video quality on a few screens that contain code.

results.content: Cursus is wat langdradig, te veel herhaling wat mij betreft. Ook is de beeldkwaliteit slecht, bijvoorbeeld bij het invullen van code is niet te zien wat er wordt ingevuld. Het had ook leuk geweest als er content was meegeleverd om de website na te maken. Met een pfd begin je niet veel. Aantal keren ook het idee gehad dat er informatie miste, waardoor ik niet uit de opdracht kwam. Na googelen bleek dan een simpel iets te missen. Al met al wel veel geleerd, maar had in veel minder tijd gekund. Duidelijk ook geen native speaker Engels.

results.content: Excellent course, to start with Oxygen Builder from the beginning is very good, good explanation by the teacher, step by step each of the elements, very interesting the way that certain possible inconveniences are solved. It would be great if they add more advanced material. I liked the section "13.27 The Blog Post section". It would be good to explain for a next course or new content about Templates. Thank you very much for good stuff.
results.content_html: Excellent course, to start with Oxygen Builder from the beginning is very good, good explanation by the teacher, step by step each of the elements, very interesting the way that certain possible inconveniences are solved. It would be great if they add more advanced material. I liked the section "13.27 The Blog Post section". It would be good to explain for a next course or new content about Templates. Thank you very much for good stuff.

results.content: Better than any YouTube video.  This course takes you step by step to really understand the how and why of Oxygen Builder.  I've done as many of the YouTube videos as possible before this course.  I really wish this course had been available sooner and I had started with it.  Would have saved me so much time!  Well done! I hope you will do more courses on Oxygen, specifically related to how to use more code and other Oxygen styling features.

I hope you will do more courses on Oxygen, specifically related to how to use more code and other Oxygen styling features.

results.content: Being new to Oxygen this is a great course to take. I'm going to go through it multiple times over the next few weeks. The segments are short and easy to reference when I need a quick refresher.

results.content: The course is well documented and with a nice pace. The one thing that is missing and that is the most important feature in my opinion of oxygen is the class use that could be described since the first lesson. When adding the padding around the menu you could have created a utility class of p-all-25 that could then be reused everywhere that is needed and create other utility class during the first elements design of your site. This way, everything tends to become quicker and quicker when upscaling your design. And you can then change your whole design with the touch of a button (colors, padding, etc)This isn’t used as it should be since it’s for me the foundation of oxygen webdesign. Maybe could you add something about this. But good workflow has to be learned from the beginning. Think of it for your next course, speed design with classes. ? for the rest, you will learn all the necessary basics.

results.content:
I can't say anything about the quality of the course yet, the author sounds good and is understandable. 
But what doesn't work at all is a course that takes place mainly on the screen and only has 720p. Seriously, 2021 and 720p, everything looks washed out. I hope I can watch the course to the end because I'm really interested in Oxygen.
